original_title: The Wiggles: Sailing Around the World
overview: Ahoy there me hearties. Hes nautical and nice. So lets join Captain Feathersword and his shipmates as they go Sailing Around The World. From London Town to Sicily and San Francisco, The Wiggles join with the Captain to sing and dance. They Hula, Hula, Hula, Nothing Could Be Cooler.
title: The Wiggles: Sailing Around the World
